mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW ( MOVIE_ID, USER_SEQ, CONTENT, REVIEW_POINT, REG_ID, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{movie_id}, #{user_seq}, #{content}, #{review_point}, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_SEQ AS review_seq, USER_SEQ AS user_seq, MOVIE_ID AS movie_id, CONTENT AS content, REVIEW_POINT AS review_point, REG_DT AS reg_dt, REG_ID AS reg_id, CHG_DT AS chg_dt FROM REVIEW WHERE MOVIE_ID = #{mid} ORDER BY REVIEW_SEQ DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET CONTENT = #{content}, REVIEW_POINT = #{review_point}, CHG_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE REVIEW_SEQ =#{review_seq}
